00024 
00025 #ifndef _BASE_EXPRESSIONNODE_
00026 #define _BASE_EXPRESSIONNODE_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/ReferencedObject>
00030 #include <base/Vector>
00031 
00032 
00033 namespace base {
00034 
00035 
00036 //
00037 // Base class of expressions that can be evaluated with a parameter Vector
00038 //  and differentiated, 
00039 //
00040 
00041 class ExpressionNode : public ReferencedObject
00042 {
00043 public:
00044   ExpressionNode() 
00045     : valueCached(false) {}
00046 
00047   enum NodeType { Sum, Difference, Product, Quotient,
00048                   Negative, Constant, Variable,
00049                   Sine, Cosine,
00050                   Leaf=1024, UnaryOp = 2048, BinaryOp = 4096 };
00051 
00052   virtual NodeType type() const = 0; 
00053   bool isOperator() const { return (isUnaryOp() || isBinaryOp()); }
00054   bool isUnaryOp()  const { return Int(type() & UnaryOp); }
00055   bool isBinaryOp() const { return Int(type() & BinaryOp); }
00056   NodeType opType() const { return NodeType(Int(type()) & Int(Leaf-1)); }
00057 
00058   Real evaluate(const Vector& params) const 
00059     { 
00060       if (!valueCached)
00061         cacheValue(params);
00062       return value;
00063     }
00064 
00065   virtual ref<ExpressionNode> differentiate() const = 0;
00066 
00067   virtual String toString() const = 0;
00068 
00069 protected:
00070   virtual void cacheValue(const Vector& params) const = 0; 
00071   virtual void resetCache() const = 0; 
00072 
00073   mutable bool valueCached;
00074   mutable Real value;
00075 
00076   virtual void operationCounts(Int& addsub, Int& multdiv, Int& trig) const = 0;
00077 
00078   friend class BinaryOpExpression;
00079   friend class UnaryOpExpression;
00080   friend class Expression;
00081 };
00082 
00083 
00084 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const ExpressionNode& e) // Output
00085 { return (out << e.toString()); }
00086 
00087 
00088 } // base
00089 
00090 #endif
